summary: Provides Flask-based REST endpoints and helper utilities for managing Project entities, handling creation, retrieval, updates, deletion, and workflow actions such as publishing, review requests, finalization, and status transitions, as well as listing projects by stage and checking name availability.
business_intent: Allows authenticated users to control the full lifecycle of their projects within the platform, supporting draft, ongoing, past, and review phases, while coordinating notifications and ensuring unique project names.
